alert.note: Alert for Door; Kewaunee (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 7:02PM CDT until June 15 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN KEWAUNEE...SOUTHERN MARINETTE AND DOOR COUNTIES... At 701 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles west of Menominee to near Marinette to near Sturgeon Bay to near Algoma to near Kewaunee, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Sturgeon Bay around 705 PM CDT. Menominee and Egg Harbor around 710 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Jacksonport, Ephraim and Newport State Park. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northeastern Wisconsin. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
